sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Neighbor A walk through the hallway and sees that room 479 light's is off again

sentences.name: NeighborA
sentences.sentence: Hmmm.. this room's light is off again..

sentences.name: NeighborB
sentences.sentence: Welcome home dear, how's your day?

sentences.name: NeighborA
sentences.sentence: Nothing special, another day another headache. I can't stand with that fat bastard( the boss)

sentences.name: NeighborB
sentences.sentence: Oh please don't be like that.

sentences.name: NeighborA
sentences.sentence: Anyway, I'm kinda curious with our neighbor of room 479, who were they again?

sentences.name: NeighborB
sentences.sentence: Oh you mean Will and Anna?

sentences.name: NeighborA
sentences.sentence: Ah yes, are they moving out? I feel like the room is always empty nowadays.

sentences.name: NeighborB
sentences.sentence: I'm not sure about that, I saw Will a couple of times, but I never saw Anna ever since the day she was hospitalized.

sentences.name: NeighborA
sentences.sentence: Oh what a poor little guy
